name: search_airport
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool skyscanner_v2.
Tool description: Skyscanner API allows users to search best flights and hotels with details and best price. This API has all needed by any developer to create a new application with some extended features.
API description: This API endpoint is responsible for providing a list of Airports for the location.

query.description: Name of the location where the **Airport** is situated.
